# てもいい

![:note]

.grammar[

*Meaning:*  is okay, is alright to, can, may

More polite is てもよろしいですか. 

In casual speech, も is usually omitted so you can use ていい.

*Formation:* Verb-てform + もいい

いadjective (remove い)  + くてもいい

なadjective + でもいい

Noun + でもいい

]
